verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
D
We worship thee dear Lord
In the beauty of holiness
Clothed in holy array
We worship Thee dear Lord
In the beauty of holiness
With an offering of praise

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
We only come to you
In the raiment You gave us
When on the cross
You purchased and saved us
Removed our rags
Cleansed us and robed us
In white
Hidden in Thee we share
The beauty of holiness

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
We worship Thee dear Lord
In the beauty of holiness
Set apart unto Thee
We worship Thee dear Lord
In the beauty of holiness
Called to be holy priests

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
We bow before Your throne
And worship Your Holiness
Yielding to Your
Rulership over us
Called and ordered
By Your authority
Hidden in Thee we share
The beauty of holiness
